subject: Re: From Miho Oshima
body:
Greetings, Dear Marina.

I thank you very much for your kind consideration.
I am Mrs. Miho Oshima. I am 67 years old, I attached a copy of my passport
on this email for you to be sure who you are communicating with and also my
Photo before my health deteriorated. I am currently living in Thailand
where I am undergoing medical treatment for throat cancer which
unfortunately has spread to my lymph nodes and some other parts of my body.
I was married to Late Mr. Kobayashi Oshima from Nagasaki who died four
years ago, and I inherited the family's business, my husband and I were
married for 31 years without a child, so I am childless and have no one to
inherit my estate when I am gone. I prayed to God asking him for direction
on who to donate the funds to before contacting you, and I want you to know
that I am not asking you for any money, rather I seek for your trust and
honesty in distributing the donation money to poor Children like
motherless, destitute homeless people. I have also donated to charity
organizations in Thailand, Africa and South American countries, but this
time I want to donate the sum of, ( a total sum of $5.5 million USD) to you
as an individual to help distribute it to the homeless children and
destitute around you.

Recently, My health has deteriorated, and my doctors have informed me that
I have a few months to live, and as a result of shock, I was hit by a
partial stroke, which affected my ability to walk, talk or do anything on
my own. Having known my condition I decided to search for a God Fearing
individual whom I can (WILL/DONATE) the funds to enable him/her utilize
this money the way I am going to instruct here. I want an individual that
will use this money to help the poor in the religious houses, orphanage
homes, widows and the destitute. I took the decision to donate this money
to you because I don’t have any child that will inherit this money, and
considering my ill health, I had no choice but to give the money out for
humanitarian assistance.

I sincerely request for your assistance in this humanitarian work. I will
send a funds transfer request letter to my bank instructing them to
transfer the total sum of Five Million, Five Hundred Thousand Dollars into
your bank account, then you will use Four Million, Five Hundred Thousand
United States Dollars to help the following people: Motherless babies,
Widows, Disable and the destitute, Helping the poor in religious houses.
The remaining One Million United States Dollars will be for you as a reward
for your good work, and I need you to promise me that you will sincerely
use the money as I mentioned above to carry out the humanitarian project.
Note that there are no risks involved because my late husband acquired the
money through legal means, and the donation's funds transfer process will
be followed legally.

Presently I am taking treatments at the Isolated specialist cancer hospital
here in Bangkok, Thailand. I don’t know how long I will be alive, but I am
praying that God should help me.  I am very weak these days and talk very
slowly. I write emails with the help of my assigned lady nurse here Ms. Kim
Chan. She is a trusted lady whom I have known in recent years, she is the
person that helps me access and write emails, sometimes responding to your
emails might be difficult if she's unavailable. I promised God that all my
donations will be done quietly without any publicity, kindly respect my
wish and handle the whole process confidential, as I do not want any
praises from anyone.

As soon as I hear from you, I will give you further details on what you are
required to provide to enable the funds transfer to your bank account.

May the almighty God bless you.

Best regards.
Mrs. Miho Oshima

subject: Re: From Miho Oshima
body:
Hello Mrs. Miho Oshima,

Thank you for sharing your story and your intentions to donate to help the less fortunate. It's truly admirable that you want to make a positive impact on those in need.

I would be interested in learning more about how I can assist with your generous donation. Could you please provide me with further details on the next steps and what information you would require from me to facilitate the funds transfer?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Marina
